    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

            <entry>cahi1:data_99629</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Satellites artificiels</string>
            <string language="en">Artificial satellites</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künstliche Satelliten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Satélites artificiais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Satelliti artificiali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τεχνητοί δορυφόροι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Satélites artificiales</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre un satellite artificiel, qui est utilisé pour des observations du temps, 
satellisant la terre à basse altitude pour voir beaucoup de détails.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an artificial satellite, which is used for weather observations, lowly orbiting the Earth to see a lot of detail.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">les satellites artificiels</string>
            <string language="en">artificial satellites</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">orbites</string>
            <string language="en">Orbits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">temps</string>
            <string language="en">weather</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen künstlichen 
Satelliten, den für Wetterbeobachtungen benutzt wird, niedrig, die 
Masse in Umlauf bringend, um eine Menge Detail zu sehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um satélite artificial,
que seja usado para observações do tempo, humilde orbitando a terra 
para ver muitos do detalhe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un satellite 
artificiale, che è utilizzato per le osservazioni del tempo, umile 
orbitando intorno alla terra per vedere il particolare molto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τεχνητό δορυφόρο, ο 
οποίος χρησιμοποιείται για τις καιρικές παρατηρήσεις, βάζοντας 
lowly τη γη σε τροχιά για να δει πολλή λεπτομέρεια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un satélite artificial,
que se utiliza para las observaciones del tiempo, humilde moviendo en 
órbita alrededor de la tierra para considerar a muchos del detalle.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">künstliche Satelliten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bahnen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wetter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">satélites artificiais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terra</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
